msbt.message: The clock is ticking, my dear. We must best those bugs while we can!
Forget the bug that got away. Move on to the next one right away. Bug catching is like love, in that way.
Alrighty, let's hurry now! We have limited time and must make the most of it.
There's no time to waste, darling! There's only time to do our very best!
I always feel lucky when I get to fish, although I don't always get lucky when I try to catch fish.
No time to waste, my dear! This is a competition, and we won't know the winner until the very end!
